messages.title: IT'S TIME FOR REAL CHANGE
messages.content: Labour's time for real change. vote Labour.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Get Brexit sorted in six months. Secures a good deal and have final say referendum.
Rebuild our public services by taxing those at the top to properly fund services for everyone.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit sorted in six months. Secures a good deal and have final say referendum.
issues.economy: Rebuild our public services by taxing those at the top to properly fund services for everyone.

leaflet.personalStatement: Barry Jones, Labour candidate for North-east Hampshire, has lived in the area for over 30 years and understands what matters to you and your family.
leaflet.additionalNotes: OUR PRIORITIES ARE: Putting People First, Living Wage, Protected Pensions, NHS and Social Care, Affordable and Warm Homes, Good Jobs & the Economy.
